monster.name: Giant Goat

trait.name: Charge
trait.text: If the goat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
trait.text: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

action.name: Ram
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

monster.description: Source: Monster Manual p. 326, Storm King's Thunder, Essentials Kit: Storm Lord's Wrath, Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
